RequirementsÂ You're in an encounter and you aren't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied}.

You carefully gather your mind's psychic might, preparing to imbue its power into your combat techniques. Your psi remains gathered for 2 rounds or until you fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}, whichever comes first. You cannot voluntarily release this power except through an action which requires it. While your psi is gathered, the following effects occur.

  • The focused power of your mind gives off telltale signs. Your eyes may flare with power, and your form and held objects may vibrate with barely-contained magical might.
  • You can use actions that have the Psi Burst trait, after which your Gathered Psi subsides.
